content: Based on the information provided in our conversation, the main challenge that Kadence faces as he starts to pursue his music career is fear of the unknown, fear of failure, and fear of not being good enough. These fears can hold him back from taking risks and pursuing his dreams, but he is determined to overcome them and make his music career a success. Another challenge Kadence may face is building a following and gaining recognition in the industry, as well as facing rejection and frustration along the way. However, Kadence's passion for music and determination to succeed will likely drive him to overcome these challenges and achieve his goals.
